item.title: Reading USN Journal with .NET
item.description: If you want to detect when a file is created, modified, or deleted, you can use the FileSystemWatcher class in .NET. However, this is only available when the application is running. What if you want to detect changes that occurred while the application was not running? item.title: Generating SBOM for NuGet packages
item.description: A Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) is a list of components in a piece of software. It is a critical part of the software supply chain, as it helps to identify and track the components used in a software project. In this post, I describe how to easily generate a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for NuGet packages. To generate an SBOM for NuGet packages, you can use the Microsoft.Sbom.Targets package.
